Variables

 $certAttributeToDisplay = "CN"
 In which attribute should we look for the user name to display ? This attribute must be present in the ["name"] line of the certificate, which usually look like this : /O=Grid/O=Globus/O=CCR Grid Portal/OU=Portal User/CN=Test \ User/emailAddress=test@nospam.buffalo.edu

Definition in file config.php.

Variable Documentation

$certAttributeToDisplay = "CN"
 

In which attribute should we look for the user name to display ? This attribute must be present in the ["name"] line of the certificate, which usually look like this : /O=Grid/O=Globus/O=CCR Grid Portal/OU=Portal User/CN=Test \ User/emailAddress=test@nospam.buffalo.edu

..So this variable should be one of "O", "OU", "CN", "emailAddress"... Usually CN is used.
